summary:
Guides and Tutorials done for the following so far:
How to have the Best Modded Skyrim Experience
Rebuilding Skyrim from Scratch
SKSE and MCM Menu Troubleshooting
Magic Resistance Primer
descriptionHtml:
[center][img]http://files.enjin.com/631988/zzzPublicNexus/Guides and Tutorials/_Guides1-large.jpg[/img][/center]


[center][img]http://files.enjin.com/631988/zzzPublicNexus/Guides and Tutorials/_Banner1.png[/img][/center]
I've put together several guides and tutorials that can help users troubleshoot problems and have a better Skyrim experience.

Guides and Tutorials done so far:

[color=#f1c232]How to Have the Best Modded Skyrim Experience[/color]
[color=#f1c232]Rebuilding Skyrim from Scratch[/color]
[color=#f1c232]SKSE and MCM Menu Troubleshooting[/color]
[color=#f1c232]Magic Resistance Primer[/color]

The guides are currently in Rich Text Format. This should allow anyone to view them. I may convert them to PDF if enough users request it.

These guides are made for users with some knowledge of Skyrim file locations and inner workings. Some expertise in Windows operating systems is required. If you are a true beginner you may need to get assistance from someone more experienced or a computer guru.

I personally run Windows 7 64-bit. It would be helpful for those running Windows XP or Windows 8 to verify the file paths in my guides.

Tips and helpful information is appreciated. If I like your suggestion I may add it to my guides and give you credit next to your suggestion.

You are free to use my guides for personal use. If you wish to use them on your own site or use parts of my guides you have permission to do so as long as you give me credit and provide a link to my guide.


[img]http://files.enjin.com/631988/zzzPublicNexus/Guides and Tutorials/_Banner-bottom.png[/img]


[center][/center][img]http://files.enjin.com/631988/zzzPublicNexus/Guides and Tutorials/_Banner2-alternate.png[/img]
[color=#f1c232]11/03/2014[/color]
How to Have the Best Modded Skyrim Experience' Guide is now version 3.1.  Added feedback from tonycubed2 and Jebbalon.  Added a
'Operating System & Skyrim Resources' - 'LOOT' - and 'Helpful Tutorials' section.  Improved the 'INI' section and updated
several other sections.  Removed the 'Limiting FPS' section - not needed.

'Rebuilding Skyrim from Scratch' is now version 2.1.  Updated all sections. Great guide if you want to start 100% fresh with a new clean Skyrim
installation.

[color=#f1c232]10/24/2014[/color]
How to Have the Best Modded Skyrim Experience' Guide is now version 3.0.  Major revision! All sections updated and improved. Added several new sections: Wrye Bash, TES5Edit, Troubleshooting CTD
Issues, plus more.

Rebuilding Skyrim from Scatch is now version 2.0.  Updated all sections. Great guide if you want to start 100% fresh with a new clean Skyrim installation.

[color=#f1c232]07/01/2014[/color]
'How to Have the Best Modded Skyrim Experience' Guide is now version 2.1. Added some additional information about Perk and ReProccer mods in the High Risk Mod section.

[color=#f1c232]06/28/2014[/color]
'How to Have the Best Modded Skyrim Experience' Guide is in it's 9th revision and is now version 2.0! Added several new sections and updated others. Well worth reading again if you have an old version!

'Rebuilding Skyrim from Scratch' is now version 1.2. Added four new sections and updated the others.

[color=#f1c232]06/10/2014[/color]
Updated 'How to have the Best Modded Skyrim Experience' to version 1.8.
Sorry for the rapid update. Missed a critical step in the 'Clean Save Procedure' section. Improved a few other steps in this section.

[color=#f1c232]06/09/2014[/color]
Updated 'How to have the Best Modded Skyrim Experience' to version 1.7.
Added two new sections - 'Backup Skyrim' and 'Clean Save Procedure'. Minor updates to the other sections.

[color=#f1c232]06/02/2014[/color]
Updated 'How to have the Best Modded Skyrim Experience' to version 1.6.
Added three new sections - Preface, Who this guide is written for, and Disclaimer. Minor updates to the other sections.

[color=#f1c232]05/30/2014[/color]
Minor updates to 'How to have the Best Modded Skyrim Experience'. Now version 1.5

[color=#f1c232]05/28/2014[/color]
Updated and renamed 'How to Have the Best Modded Skyrim Experience' to version 1.4
Major updates to the mod risk section and minor updates to the other sections


[color=#f1c232]05/26/2014[/color]
Major Update for all Guides! All sections improved and updated!

[color=#f1c232]02/19/2013[/color]
How to have the Best Skyrim Experience (version 1.2)
- Updated all sections
- Added the following sections:
1. Mod Compatibility (thanks to Fightback)
2. Load Order

SKSE and MCM Menu Troubleshooting (version 1.2)
- Made minor updates
- Updated - 'One mod doesn't show MCM menu options but the others do' (thanks to tonycubed2)

[color=#f1c232]02/18/2013[/color]
Added - Magic Resistance Primer (version 1.0)

SKSE and MCM Menu Troubleshooting (version 1.1)
- Added an Anti-Virus section
- Made minor updates to other sections
- Renamed the guide to 'SKSE and MCM Menu Troubleshooting'

How to have the Best Skyrim Experience (version 1.1)
- Completely reworked the Mod section (thanks to Fightback's input)
- Added the following sections:
1. Anti-Virus
2. Miscellaneous Tips
3. When Problems Occur

[color=#f1c232]02/15/2013[/color]
Version 1.0 - Initial Release

[img]http://files.enjin.com/631988/zzzPublicNexus/Guides and Tutorials/_Banner-bottom.png[/img]
Have an awesome Skyrim experience!

CrushBoss


[img]http://files.enjin.com/631988/zzzPublicNexus/CombatEvolved/_10Banner-Recommended.jpg[/img]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56980/?]VioLens - A Killmove Mod[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/18916/?]Lanterns of Skyrim[/url] (set timer to 120 seconds)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9366/?]New Bard Songs[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27427/?]NPCs of Dibella[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51189/?]Immersive Wenches[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9052/?]Smaller Atronachs[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13457/?]Face Light[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17491/?]Faster GET UP STAND UP animation[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/601/?]Realistic Ragdolls and Force[/url] - use the Realistic version - you ONLY need the ESP
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26800/?]XP32 Maximum Skeleton -XPMS[/url] - use the 1.9x version unless you have to have HDT (should be the last mod that you install)

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9465/?]Faster Mining[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11119/?]More Firewood per Chop[/url]

[font=Georgia][color=#ff00ff][u][b][size=4]Sound[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24805/?]Better Animal Footsteps[/url] (install this mod first (before other sound mods) to allow other sound mods to overwrite some files)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43773/?]Audio Overhaul for Skyrim 2[/url] (make sure you add patches for any needed mods)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54387/?]Immersive Sounds - Compendium[/url] (make sure you add patches for any needed mods)
Fantasy Sountrack Project + Combat Music - Google 'AceeQ Modding' (use non-replacers) (make sure you add patches for any needed mods)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1702/?]Immersive Skyrim Thunder[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58359/?]Enhanced Draugr FX[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58554/?]Enhanced Beast FX[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/3799/?]Thundering Shouts[/url]

[font=Georgia][color=#ff00ff][u][b][size=4]Guides and Tutorials[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31793/?]Skyrim Guides and Tutorials[/url]

[font=Georgia][color=#ff00ff][u][b][size=4]Utilities[/size][/b][/u][/color][/font]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/25859/?]TES5Edit[/url] (release version) or [url=http://afkmods.iguanadons.net/index.php?/topic/3750-wipz-tes5edit/]TES5Edit[/url] (pre-release version - recommended)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37981/?]TES5Edit Merge Script[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12801/?]Optimizer Textures[/url] (use minimal setting - don't include BSAs)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55803/?]Optimizer Textures – Improved INI file[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53045/?]Savegame Script Scalpel - Papyrus Data Transfer[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4804/?]BSA Unpacker[/url]

Make sure that you install any needed mod requirements/dependencies and compatibility patches for the mods that you use. Please pay close attention to this! Follow ALL mod instructions for each mod that you install!

These are the Core mods that I run and have been running many of them for years without issue. The above mods I recommend without reservation and are generally solid and well written.



[center][img]http://files.enjin.com/631988/zzzPublicNexus/CombatEvolved/_11Banner-Recommended-powerful.jpg[/img][/center]

[b][color=#ff00ff][size=3]Highly Recommended System Specs[/size][/color][/b]:

[color=#f6b26b]Windows 7 64-bit or Windows 8 64-bit
Intel Core i7 Quad-Core or Intel Core i5 Dual or Quad Core Processor
8 GB DD3 RAM (or more)
Nvidia GeForce 580, 680, 770, 780, 970 or faster Video card with a minimum of 2 GB VRAM (3-6 GB VRAM is optimal)
Optimize your Skyrim setup using all of the advice in this guide[/color] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31793/?]How to Have the Best Modded Skyrim Experience[/url]

[b][color=#ff00ff]If you don't have the Optimal System Specs then choose 1K versions (whenever possible)[/color][/b].

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9080/?]Bethesda Hi-Res DLC Optimized[/url] - Full 1K (use this instead of the Official High Resolution Texture Packs!)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/26269/?]Langleys Textures Workshop[/url] - all-in-one
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/44201/?]Dust Effects[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59809/?]Vivid Clouds and Fogs[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56137/?]Realistic Clouds[/url] - 2K
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54623/?]Luminescent Luna Moths[/url] - CyanMoth
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10383/?]Better Dynamic Snow[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49011/?]Quality Snow HD 4K[/url] - works with Better Dynamic Snow
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7405/?]Quality Snowflakes[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53971/?]AURORA[/url] - v2 x2048
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55518/?]Real Roads for Skyrim[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14227/?]Ruins Clutter Improvement[/url]
Skyrim Realistic Overhaul - SRO - Google 'Skyrim Realistic Overhaul - SRO torrent' - beware that many torrent clients and torrent sites are fully of viruses, malware, and spyware - PM me for recommendations
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38539/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Landscape[/url] - don't use LODs
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40564/?]SkyFalls and SkyMills[/url] - if installing manually make sure you check each folder for files - it's super easy to miss some and will break your game if you do - carefully follow all instructions!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2692/?]Cinematic Fire Effects 2 HD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/8655/?]SMIM[/url] - Full - use the all-in-one ESP
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?]Skyrim HD 2K[/url] - Full
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/31856/?]Moss Rocks[/url] - use SMIM compatible version
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58461/?]Skyrim Realistic Texture Overhaul Dragons[/url] - download the Deadly Dragons and Bellyaches New Dragon Species addons
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40512/?]Project Parallax Remastered HD 2K[/url] - only if using an ENB
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40512/?]Project Parallax Stonewall Update[/url] - only if using an ENB
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39874/?]Vivid Landscapes - Dungeons & Ruins[/url] - 2048 - use SMIM and Better Dynamic Snow patches
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41198/?]Vivid Landscapes - Volcanic Area[/url] - 2048 - use HQ Parallax optional
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39190/?]aMidianBorn Caves and Mines[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Skyrim Flora Overhaul[/url] - Full Regular - v.2.0 alpha or newer
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51069/?]Realistic Aspen Trees[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38497/?]Vivid Landscapes - Cliffs & Creeks[/url] - 2048
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37256/?]Superior Rocks[/url] - Light Grey HD-2K NEW
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23812/?]Seasons of Skyrim ENB[/url] - (personal preference is True HDR with No DOF optional)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/5388/?]Real Ice[/url] - Azure Glacier - 2K + Parallax - install less bright addon
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43221/?]Vivid Landscapes - Tundra Moss Revised[/url] - red - use Parallax Map addon (if using an ENB) plus the SMIM patch
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water Two[/url] - High Resolution
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48938/?]Realistic Water Two - ENB Textures[/url] - only if using an ENB
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48938/?]Watercolor for ENB and Realistic Water Two[/url] - only if using an ENB - follow all instructions!
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40564/?]SkyFalls and SkyMills[/url] - (Main mod already installed) - install Parallax (if using Project Parallax Remastered), Realistic Water Two patch, LOD addon
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29782/?]HD Enhanced Terrain PRO[/url] - Blended Version
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60205/?]Vivid Landscapes - Orc and Farmhouses[/url] - 2048 - use SMIM Ropes and SMIM Carriages downloads
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54302/?]Rustic Windows[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/1192/?]High Quality Food and Ingredients[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58405/?]Jen's 2K Food and Ingredients[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42492/?]Realistic Sun and Sunglare[/url] - Climates of Tamriel not needed or required
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/836/?]Realistic Smoke and Embers[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29608/?]Detailed Rugs[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30164/?]Natural Grass Texture Floor[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30971/?]High Definition Ivy[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33718/?]Webs[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36457/?]Better Nirnroot[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41207/?]Blacksmithing Design HD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33603/?]Roadsigns Redone[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/34399/?]Animated Dwemer Lift Load Doors[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59907/?]EWIs Glowing Mushrooms, Hanging Moss, Blackreach Mushrooms, HD Thickets[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54349/?]Skygazer Moons[/url] - 2K
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59714/?]Oil[/url] - 2K
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60340/?]Realistic HD Ores[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60438/?]Realistic HD Ingots[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60663/?]Realistic HD Misc[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60412/?]PELTAPALOOZA - Pelts of Skyrim Expansion[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60220/?]Verdant - A Skyrim Grass Plugin[/url] (shorter grass version) (set iMinGrassSize=75 for best results)
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61254/?]Rustic Pottery[/url]
CM Bark - need the URL, please PM me
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61875/?]4K Parallax Treebark[/url] - 2K - use Realistic Aspen Trees patch
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62701/?]RUSTIC POTIONS and POISONS[/url] - 2K
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62425/?]Embers HD[/url] - 2048 - install forges addon
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62801/?]Vivid Landscapes - Tundra Region[/url] - 2K - install any patches that you want
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62955/?]Lock o Motion[/url]

Make sure that you install any needed mod requirements/dependencies and compatibility patches for the mods that you use. Please pay close attention to this! Follow ALL mod instructions for each mod that you install!

These are the Core mods that I run and have been running many of them for years without issue. The above mods I recommend without reservation and are generally solid and well written.
